testcase.name: Booking with Fields marked with Red asterix are mandatory
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Adacting page..............................................passed When user should enter username and password................................passed And User should click login button..........................................passed When user on Serach page need to enter Select location , noofroom,cid,cod,adult per room.passed And User need to clik search button.........................................passed

testcase.name: Booking with Fileds Without marked with Red asterix
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Adacting page..............................................passed When user should enter username and password................................passed And User should click login button..........................................passed When user need to select hotels,roomtype,child per room.....................passed And user need to proceed search button......................................passed Then user need to validate error message....................................passed
